name: Pollution Protector!
description: Just a small game made for an Underwater themed game jam where bubbles had to be a mechanic. You play as Puff the Blowfish and must help him keep the Ocean clean. Use the arrow keys to move and space bar to blow up a bubble. Once Puff has reached full size he can release a bubble that will pick up the trash and push it out of the ocean! I hope to add more trash variants as well as powerups for Puff to pick up.
